headline: Compared to Estimates, Halliburton (HAL) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Halliburton (HAL) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

raw.headline: Compared to Estimates, Halliburton (HAL) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
raw.summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Halliburton (HAL) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Patterson-UTI Energy Q2 Earnings Miss, Sales Beat Estimates, Fall Y/Y
summary: PTEN expects a slight sequential decline in SG&A expenses and depreciation, depletion, amortization, and impairment expense to total around $230 million for the third quarter.

raw.headline: Patterson-UTI Energy Q2 Earnings Miss, Sales Beat Estimates, Fall Y/Y
raw.summary: PTEN expects a slight sequential decline in SG&A expenses and depreciation, depletion, amortization, and impairment expense to total around $230 million for the third quarter.

headline: Oceaneering Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: OII expects consolidated revenues to rise in third-quarter 2025 compared with the prior-year period, with EBITDA between $100 million and $110 million.

raw.headline: Oceaneering Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
raw.summary: OII expects consolidated revenues to rise in third-quarter 2025 compared with the prior-year period, with EBITDA between $100 million and $110 million.

headline: Core Laboratories Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Expenses Increase Y/Y
summary: CLB's second-quarter earnings beat estimates. However, it declined year over year due to the underperformance of the Reservoir Description segment.

raw.headline: Core Laboratories Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Expenses Increase Y/Y
